item.description:
Hey everyone,

No need to RSVP - nobody does!   No worries though, we usually get 15 - 40 runners to our Thursday night Meet-ups!   

A bit about the Meet-up:

Meet at the store at 652 Tremont Street on Thursdays at 6:30 pm. Runners of all abilities are welcome to come meet new runners and enjoy a great workout at your own pace!

We jog over to The Fens track and do a light "change of pace" workout at your own pace.  It's a great way to get a quality workout in a no pressure environment!  In total, we run about 4 - 5 miles.

It's a fun bunch of folks and a great way to meet new people!

Hope to see you soon!

Lot of love,

Dan & Justin!
item.name: South End Running Group Weekly Meetup
